titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of both Houses.

action.text: Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 465.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/27/1996--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on June 27 or 28, 1996, until July 8, 1996, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from June 27, 28, 29, or 30, 1996, until July 8, 1996.
